name: discretize

about.summary: Discretization tools for finite volume and inverse problems
Discretization tools for finite volume and inverse problems

raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  version: "0.12.0"
  # ensure is_freethreading gets detected as a used variable
  touch_is_freethreading: ${{ is_freethreading }}

package:
  name: discretize
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/discretize/discretize-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5b6fce19bd9e7a1d82db4ba7de41a95d178fc504a9169f6009bc2e3a386a8b44

build:
  number: 0
  skip: match(python, "<3.11") or (match(python, "=3.14") and linux and is_freethreading and (aarch64 or ppc64le))

requirements:
  build:
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - cython
        - numpy
        - ninja
        - pkg-config
        - meson-python
    - ${{ stdlib('c') }}
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
  host:
    - pip
    - meson-python
    - ninja
    - pkg-config
    - python
    - python-build
    - cython
    - numpy
    - setuptools_scm >=6.2
  run:
    - python
    - numpy >=1.22.4
    - scipy >=1.12

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - discretize
  - script:
    - python -c "import discretize; print(discretize.__version__)"
    - python -c "from importlib.metadata import version; print(version('discretize'))"

about:
  homepage: http://github.com/simpeg/discretize
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Discretization tools for finite volume and inverse problems
  repository: https://github.com/simpeg/discretize
  documentation: https://discretize.simpeg.xyz

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - lheagy
    - jcapriot

about.summary: Discretization tools for finite volume and inverse problems
